item.description:
Although this isn't a traditional dining out meetup, some members expressed some interest. I will be holding a purse party at my apt. in Quincy.
The representative will bring between 30-40 bags and accessories, of different styles and colors. Prices are reasonable, ranging from $19-$135. If you don't see what you like, you can also order online. Check out the website, beijobags.com.
I've had 4 purses over the past 8 years or so (not because they wear down, just because I love them), and get compliments where ever I go.
Because this is not a traditional event, there are no event fees, and feel free to bring a guest. Just RSVP so I know how many people to cook for, and yes... I will be cooking.

So come and check out the bags, and hang out with us for an afternoon. And if you don't want to buy, no big deal.

I will email my address to Yes RSVPs close to the deadline.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Purse Party
